qas.question: What major theater groups are in Oklahoma City?

answers.text: Oklahoma City Theatre Company, Carpenter Square Theatre, Oklahoma Shakespeare in the Park, and CityRep

qas.question: What is the oldest community theater group west of the Mississippi River?
Where is the American Theatre Company based?
What is the oldest resident professional theater company in Oklahoma?

context: Prominent theatre companies in Oklahoma include, in the capital city, <a0_0>Oklahoma City Theatre Company, Carpenter Square Theatre, Oklahoma Shakespeare in the Park, and CityRep<a0_0/>. CityRep is a professional company affording equity points to those performers and technical theatre professionals. In <a2_0>Tulsa<a2_0/>, Oklahoma's oldest resident professional company is <a3_0>American Theatre Company<a3_0/>, and <a1_0>Theatre Tulsa<a1_0/> is the oldest community theatre company west of the Mississippi. Other companies in <a4_0>Tulsa<a4_0/> include Heller Theatre and Tulsa Spotlight Theater. The cities of Norman, Lawton, and Stillwater, among others, also host well-reviewed community theatre companies.
